definitions.definition: A print made by creating the design using oil paint or printer's ink on metal or glass, then transferring the image directly to paper.
The technique of making such prints.
A keyboard -operated typesetting and casting machine that makes and sets separate characters .
A sailboat designed to be crewed or raced by a single person.
In the Hindley–Milner type system , a single specific data type .

main_definition: ( art , printing ) A print made by creating the design using oil paint or printer's ink on metal or glass, then transferring the image directly to paper.
secondary_definitions: ( art , printing , uncountable ) The technique of making such prints.
A keyboard -operated typesetting and casting machine that makes and sets separate characters .
( sailing ) A sailboat designed to be crewed or raced by a single person.
( computing theory ) In the Hindley–Milner type system , a single specific data type .
